website_summaries.verdict: A tiny but mighty flower press kit aimed at kids that comes with the extra bonus of craft supplies.
pros: Includes 2 “trinket” boxes, 4 cards and bookmarks for DIY projects
Also includes glue, a brush, and tape, all at a bargain price
cons: Can only fit small flowers and leaves (dimensions are 4" x 4")

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago, I had purchased this product, and used it for many years, until we had a home fire. This month, working on some fall art projects, decided to reorder, without second thoughts, because I was so happy with the earlier product. To my surprise, this product is now half the size it was, and provided other miscellaneous items I have no use for. I am quite disappointed. Sorry, but simply unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Earrings By Suzann

customer_reviews.title: This might be good for "wild flowers" but would not work for flowers ...
customer_reviews.text: The actual flower press is less then 4 inches, and big screws take up some of the flower press surface. This might be good for "wild flowers" but would not work for flowers in my neighborhood. I had purchased two of these, called Amazon, and returned the two kits.
customer_reviews.author: Elsee D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend that wanted to press her mother's funeral flowers as a keep sake. I had no idea where to begin or how to find something but here I landed. I had them shipped to her and she LOVED IT! best money Ive ever spent - she was so happy!
customer_reviews.author: J-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 7 years old girl. She loves it. It's great activity for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: When getting birthday presents for my daughters friends I always tend to choose games or crafts...and if I’m really on it I’ve ordered from amazon in advance of said birthday party. This kit is great and is super giftable for any little kiddo in your life.
customer_reviews.author: jennys

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, fun, *science and nature.
customer_reviews.text: This is a birthday gift for my daughter. But it came in great shape and it looks like so much fun! She is going to love it. I can't wait. We can even use this with homeschooling. It will tie in perfectly with our science and nature studies.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bottum93

customer_reviews.title: Good for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Actually a very nice kit for how small of a box it comes in. Perfect for my 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Small Flowers
customer_reviews.text: This product works well for small flowers. It is perfect for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: TrevJohnAnd

customer_reviews.title: Fun project for older artists kids
customer_reviews.text: Had these when I was a kid and got this for my niece for Xmas frm Santa. It really is something for older kids as she's only 6 and didn't really have a interest in them cause it takes so long to dry, and then what do you do with it after, she says?? Lol, but yes for the artist its perfect .
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully and small enough to travel with
customer_reviews.text: This is small and portable - perfect for traveling and collecting flowers along the way to keep for memories. We have a scrapbook for our little one, and this was a wonderful way to collect fallen flowers on our travels and then have them perfectly pressed and ready for the pages when we got home.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We've made lots of pressed flowers in this and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: I have had better luck just using cardboard
customer_reviews.text: I have had better luck just using cardboard, paper and heavy books. We couldn't get the screws to tighten enough to provide the pressure needed to press effectively
customer_reviews.author: CHG

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Only good for when flowers are in season. Didn’t accomplish much with this project though my ten-year-old did love assembling boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Tea Martine

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you think there are flowers
customer_reviews.text: Be warned. Deceiving. Flowers etc not included. You have to dry your own. If I wanted to do that I wouldn’t buy this kit. It was a gift and a waste
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dillow

customer_reviews.title: For the Crafty..
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as gift for my 9 year old niece. I was informed that she is very crafty, and that she is thrilled with this item. Should be worth many hours of craftiness. :)
customer_reviews.author: MuffinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old niece loves flowers. This is an awesome gift that she enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Good fun
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old niece has a lot of fun with this kit. Bought on sale and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than you'd think
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, but much smaller than I anticipated. MUCH SMALLER. My kids enjoyed it, but it didn't love it. Did what it was supposed to, but so would have a big book.
customer_reviews.author: Shoptan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit and to spark interest I'm things other than electronics!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Neither here nor their. Kind of a basic kit that was just okay. Used it once and it has been sitting in a box evers since.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G

customer_reviews.title: It'll work for now but I plan to get a better one for my niece when she gets older
customer_reviews.text: My fault not reading how small it was. It's a child's press but I wish it was larger and and not so cheaply made. I could have made this myself out of cardboard and pressing paper. It'll work for now but I plan to get a better one for my niece when she gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small and cheap but I like the extra stuff they throw in (cards
customer_reviews.text: Kind of small and cheap but I like the extra stuff they throw in (cards, bookmarks, etc). Flowers are still pressing so we'll see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect set for my granddaughter! Now we just have to wait for the spring flowers!
customer_reviews.author: Mike from Healdsburg, CA

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't figure out how to use it, so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't figure out how to use it, so I gave it to my granddaughter. I'm sure she can figure it out
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to using this spring is in the air and soon will have flower to practice with
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bitzer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I love it I just pressed a flower oh my gosh it's so pretty and easy way better than using a book and the brackets stay on good I give this a 5star rating have fun!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Kids used it one time and it couldn't be used again. Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Simple easy-to-use and a lot of fun my six-year-old loved it

customer_reviews.title: She loved it! Great activity for
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a 7 year old for Christmas. She loved it! Great activity for kids

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. My 7 year old granddaughter loves this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. My 7 year old granddaughter loves this craft!

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for that
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for actually pressing flowers. I tried to use it to hold money to bind the edges for gifts. Not sturdy enough for that.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The board is kind of cheap and does not work for thick flowers.

customer_reviews.title: Afternoon of fun
customer_reviews.text: All of the kits by the company that we've tried have been engaging and easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craft for smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time and was a breeze to do. Excellent craft for smaller kids.
customer_reviews.author: janet slover

customer_reviews.title: Great product to encourage the imagination!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed by the 4 year old for whom's birthday this was purchased. She's been a creative busy body since she's started to use it. She even made an instructional video showcasing the Flower Art Kit (of course, with mom's help)! Great product to encourage the imagination of a young or older child.
customer_reviews.author: HipV

customer_reviews.title: and my daughter loved it. It hadn't really gotten into full spring ...
customer_reviews.text: The Easter Bunny brought this to our house this year, and my daughter loved it. It hadn't really gotten into full spring here yet, so we haven't used it, but will be soon, and I expect it to be a blast. If my review changes after I've sampled it, I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rainy day project for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our niece/s 7th birthday. She loves it. Came packaged nicely, on time, and was a great price. Couldn't be more thrilled. Contents exactly as described. Was easy enough for her to work with mostly on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Hope3652

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr. old daughter loves it. She did need help assembling all the little pieces once she picked her flowers.
customer_reviews.author: LTrain

customer_reviews.title: Was very easy to use though
customer_reviews.text: Was very small, Hibiscus was too big and had to pull each petal off to make it fit. Was very easy to use though.
customer_reviews.author: Jess F

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Haven't got to try it yet
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Haven't got to try it yet, but it arrived quickly and I am excited to use it this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 9 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use. My daughter, 9 years old, got this for her birthday. She has gathered so many flowers to press. Then she makes bookmarks out of them. The flowers are very delicate once pressed. You may want to avoid if your child does not have patience.
customer_reviews.author: mom-of-4

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Flowers end up smushed!! Waste of time and money! Would reccomend to no one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for her birthday and she has not told me how she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: and she had so much fun making cards and projects for other people
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for a 10-year-old that I nanny, and she had so much fun making cards and projects for other people. I would pay more for a bigger set with more contents. Overall, we were both pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to try it out!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter, but we have not had a chance to try it out yet. But we have watched in YouTube videos and it looks like a great deal of fun and we are looking forward to it. She is always bringing me flowers or leaves and calling them flowers or anything that she can give me as far as that goes so now I can actually save them forever
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chase

product_meta.title: 4M Green Creativity Pressed Flower Art Kit - Arts & Crafts DIY Recycle Floral Press Gift for Kids & Teens, Girls & Boys, Multi
product_meta.description:
The 4M Pressed Flower Art Kit is the perfect introduction to a classic craft hobby that can last a lifetime. The kit's 4-inch flower press will make attractive cards, bookmarks, trinket boxes, and more. The kit includes a flower press, glue, brush and double-sided tape. Detailed instructions for use and care are included. Perfect for children interested in arts and crafts. Recommended for ages 5 years and up.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Decorate cards, bookmarks or trinket boxes with our 4M Pressed Flower Art Kit. Kit includes 4" flower press, glue, brush, double-sided tape and instructions.
feature_bullets: The kit's 4-inch flower press will make attractive cards, bookmarks, trinket boxes, and more.
The kit includes a flower press, glue, brush and double-sided tape.
Detailed instructions for use and care are included.
Perfect for children interested in arts and crafts.
Recommended for ages 5 years and up.
Challenge your child's imagination with 4M toys and kits.
4M educational toys cover a wide range of educational subjects and include science kits, arts and crafts kits, robotics kits, and more.
4M offers a wide range of toys and kits to let you build a clock, crochet a placemat, or turn your room into a planetarium--all in the name of making learning fun.
4" flower press will make cards, bookmarks or trinket boxes
Includes glue, brush, double-sided tape and instructions
